tasks.task: Starting tomatoes, peppers, and eggplants in a greenhouse using heat mats.
subtasks: Preparing soil mix for seed starting.
Creating furrows in the soil for seeds.
Tapping seeds into the furrows with precision.
Covering seeds with loose soil to the appropriate depth.
Labeling seeds with variety names and dates.
Moving pepper seedlings from initial flat to individual pots.
Transplanting tomato and pepper seedlings into larger containers for further growth.
